meanings.definition: Not characteristic of or appropriate to human beings.
meanings.sent1: The robot's unhuman appearance startled the children.
meanings.sent2: The alien had an unhuman ability to communicate telepathically.
meanings.sent3: The unhuman behavior of the talking parrot amused the zoo visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her unhuman strength in lifting heavy objects amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The eerie, unhuman glow of the mysterious creature left a lasting impression on the witnesses.

meanings.sent1: The haunted house had an unhuman atmosphere that sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent2: The unhuman sound coming from the abandoned factory made me uneasy.
meanings.sent3: The unhuman speed at which the car was moving seemed almost supernatural.
meanings.sent4: The unhuman silence of the empty forest was both peaceful and eerie.
meanings.sent5: The unhuman intelligence of the computer surpassed all expectations.
